Module f22_hw06_comp310_f22_hw06_03

Package model.strategies.update

package model.strategies.update
  • Class
    Description
    ColorStrategy
    Flashes different shades of colors every 15 frame counts, based on ball type: orange for prey, purple for predator, and green for scavenger.
    CompositeUpdateStrategy
    A strategy that combines two strategies.
    ErrorUpdateStrategy
    A strategy for dealing with errors.
    FadingStrategy
    A strategy for a ball that fades a little every time it bounces.
    GravityStrategy
    A strategy that simulates the acceleration of gravity on the ball.
    IUpdateStrategy
    An interface for the possible ABall strategies.
    PartyStrategy
    A strategy that bounces a random number of times before partying.
    PoppingStrategy
    A strategy that pops the ball after a given number of bounces.
    SpawnStrategy
    A strategy that spawns a popping ball with the same strategy on each bounce.
    StraightStrategy
    A strategy where the ball moves and bounces according to Newtonian motion.
    SwitcherStrategy
    A strategy for a ball that switches strategies.
    TeleportingStrategy
    A strategy in which the ball teleports to a random point when it hits a wall.
